info.title: Express Swagger UI API
info.description: API documentation for Express with Swagger UI

hruid.description: The human-readable identifier for the learning path. This is only unique in combination with a version and language.

language.description: The language of the learning path.

title.description: The title of the learning path.

description.description: A brief description of the learning path.
description.example: A beginner-friendly learning path for programming.

image.description: The image associated with the learning path in bytes.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the learning path was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the learning path was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the learning path.
The unique identifier for the learning path node.

lpId.description: The ID of the learning path this node belongs to.

loId.description: The ID of the learning object associated with this node.

instruction.description: Optional instructions for this learning path node.
instruction.example: Complete the exercises in this section.

startNode.description: Indicates whether this node is the starting point of the learning path.

fromNodeId.description: The ID of the learning path node this transition starts from.

toNodeId.description: The ID of the learning path node this transition leads to.

condition.description: The condition that must be met to trigger this transition. If no condition is given, the condition is assumed to be met
